---
title: "Full-Width Banner Example"
format:
  html:
    page-layout: full
---

```{=html}
<style>
  /* Remove default body margin/padding to ensure full-bleed width */
  body, .main-container {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
  }

  /* The banner container covers full width and a specific height */
  .banner-container {
    width: 100%;
    height: 80%;           /* Adjust as desired */
    position: relative;      /* so child elements (text) can be absolutely placed */

    /* The fixed background: center, cover, and no-repeat */
    background: url('../img/CI_cover.jpeg') no-repeat center center fixed;
    background-size: cover;
  }

  /* The text that goes on the dark portion of the image */
  .banner-text {
    position: absolute;
    /* Position the text at bottom-left corner or wherever the dark region is */
    left: 40px;
    bottom: 40px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    margin: 0;
  }
</style>

<div class="banner-container">
  <div class="banner-text">
    <h1>Title Over Dark Region</h1>
    <p>A short tagline goes here.</p>
  </div>
</div>
```
